text: @narendramodi @Statsmin Thanku modi sir for announcing great package that really helps and great support to various sectors, you are the great hope to all indians , your vision to control covid-19 is very greatful, in this tough situation your giving lot of support to all indians. Jai Hind, jai Modi sir
